text: Abdul Taleb Zaki () was a Hazara politician and jihadist from Afghanistan. Abdul Taleb Zaki, son of Abdul Wahid born in 1960 in Bamiyan Province of Afghanistan. He was a commander and a member of Hezbe Wahdat political party in Afghanistan. He was the governor of Bamyan Province for four years from 1994 to 1998. He died in 1998 in Ghazni Province. ==References== Category:Hazara politicians Category:Bamyan Province Category:1960 births Category:1998 deaths Category:20th-century Afghan people
title: Abdul Taleb Zaki
